***OOC: A note to all players reading my actions. My first several 
posts will be on the longish side until I work out details and 
characters. Please bear with me. *grin*

**************************

 ::Domnijoe and BlindChaos::

    Back at the ship, Cyclonus' message comes up mangled and faintly 
audable. Domnijoe gives the communications pannel a hard smack and
the 
problem fades. Sort of.
    Blindchaos looks at his companion. 
    "what did he say?"
    "I believe we're being rescued." Domnijoe says. She pauses a 
momment and sends out another message.
    "Our communication systems", she says, "are a mess so I hope you 
can hear me. Thank Primus there are still Decepticons on the planet. 
We have a downed ship. We're in need of energon." She pauses and 
firmly kicks Blindchaos to rid him of his endless smirk. It was
really 
annoying her. " We will wait for your arrival. Domnijoe out."
    Blindchaos looks hopeful and flabberghasted at the same time. 
    "Who's Cyclonus?" he says.
    Domnijoe shruggs.
    "Beats me. The name sounds familliar but it's probably my 
imagination."
    "You think Megatron is still here?"
    Domnijoe sighs.
    "I hope. We need a kick ass and take names leader again. The 
shmucks I was stuck with were too...wussy." 
    "Like me." The Decepticon male says, mournful for the first time 
on their trip.
     "I never said that." Domnijoe snapps. "Yer just so God-damn 
chipper all the time." The Decepticon female leans back on the 
computer terminal. "You know I can't do your job like you do. Nobody 
can. I'm sure the present leader will have plenty of work for you to 
do."
     Domnijoe suddenly notices the communications pannel hadn't cut 
off her message when she thought. She bangs the computer, which shuts 
it down. She hoped Cyclonus didn't hear the entire conversation.
     She sighs. (This should be an interesting expanation) she thinks 
to herself, (If he cares about what was said.)

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

****************************************************************
